View bagian depan terasa seperti di Tokyo Jepang. Terlihat MRT bolak-balik. Suka sekali betah sekali tinggal di sini.

Jauh-jauh dari Palembang, nggak sama sekali menyesal memilih kiryat hotel. Sebelumnya saya melihat di tripet abizar kemudian komen-komen di Traveloka di Agoda itu wow keren makanya saya nggak salah pilih hotel ini. Stafnya juga ramah sekali suka membantu apapun yang saya inginkan mereka siap bantu. Terima kasih buat kiryat hotel Fatmawati Jakarta semoga tetap bisa mempertahankan kualitasnya

text:
Menginap disini 3 Malam karena acara Kantor (BRI), First Impression adalah Pelayanan yang baik dari Para Staff, Proses Check in Check Out yang cepat. Ruangan bersih, Compliement Sangat Baik. Oh ya, masakannya ala Indonesia. Soto Ayamnya paling Enak dan menurut saya TERBAIK dari beberapa masakan di hotel yang pernah saya coba. Thank to Chef Adyan, You did it well. General Manager Hotel Pak Ari juga sangat ramah dan menyapa para tamu dan senantiasa turun tangan langsung melayani dan memastikan pelayanan berjalan dengan baik. Great Job. Laundry juga cepat, bersih dan wangi. Hotel ini dekat dengan MRT Blok A. Ada kendaraan hotel yang siap mengantar jika diperlukan.

Overall Saya sangat PUAS menginap disini. Saran saya sediakan juga Meja Kursi Resto untuk Perokok atau sekedar ngopi setelah sarapan.

Sukses Selalu Kyriad Fatmawati

text:
Check in pada average time 17-18PM. Menginap di kamar superior double. Namun diberikan kamar ujung (corner). Ruangan yang sempit, wifi yang tidak cukup kencang, kamar mandi yang memanfaatkan space alakadarnya sehingga sangat sempit.
Jendela dengan pemandangan yang terhalang oleh bangunan lain disamping hotel.
Lokasi cukup strategis, dan hotel tidak begitu luas. Saya kira ini adalah hotel yang biasa digunakan untuk prostitusi (but maybe i'm wrong).
Sajian sarapan cukup variatif. Namun tidak memiliki egg station, sehingga memerlukan request terpisah. Itupun diantarkan dengan waktu yg cukup lama, serta tidak sesuai request.
Jika keperluan datang ke daerah Fatmawati untuk liburan dan untuk keperluan bisnis, jangan menginap di hotel ini. Lebih baik mencari hotel lain meskipun harus mengeluarkan uang sedikit lebih banyak.

text:
Posisinya strategis, dekat dengan ITC Fatmawati dan kalau malam tidak sulit untuk mencari makanan karena dekat dengan Lesehan Mail. Juga dekat dengan fasilitas ATM beberapa Bank.

Pelayanannya baik dan cepat, resepsionis seperti mba varel dan tim siap membantu dengan ramah. Begitupun pelayanan security dan petugas cleaningnya.

Suasana hotelnya nyaman dan bersih, kamarnya tidak terlalu kecil dan fasilitas kamarnya lengkap. Sayangnya hanya terdiri dari dua lantai hotelnya, sehingga view di kamar lantai terataspun masih agak kurang baik bila kita melihat melalui jendelanya. Semoga kedepan ditambahnya jadi 4 atau 5 lantai. Amin

Harga murah tapi ini bukan hotel murahan. Dijamin gak nyesel deh pilih hotel ini.

Thanks Kyriad Hotel atas pelayanannya.

Dear rissar_ringo,

First of all, I would like to personally thank you for staying with us and choosing Kyriad Hote; Fatmawati Jakarta as your preferred place to stay. Thank you for your valuable feedback which will help us to identify our shortfalls and areas which needs improvement. text:
The staff at Kyriad were very professional and very helpful to me along every step of my journey. Would like to commend all the staff, though I only can recall Ms Deti, Ms Sinthia, Mr Andre, and Mr Abdullah for their help. I had to bring my insulin along with me, but as the room does not have a fridge, they kept my medication safe and I really was grateful for that. 

The room is very spacious, and selection of television shows is great! The beds are clean, and the bathroom was wide and spacious. Appreciated the housekeeping folding my clothes and footwear neatly as well! 

Was slightly sad I got the room facing the inside as there is no scenery to look at. When I first arrived to the hotel, I received a room on the smoking floor as there was no more non-smoking rooms left. But it was only there a while and went away quickly. 

I bought the package with breakfast from Agoda, which had a very generous spread of rice, noodles, cereals, fruits, buburs as well. Mr Andre was very helpful when assisting me during breakfast during my stay!

Kyriad is just 6 minutes walk away from Blok A MRT station and there are also some local buses nearby. Blok M Square and Blok M Plaza are just 1 MRT station away as well. 

Ms Sinthia was helpful to me when I needed to know where to go and how to get there. She assured me that Gojek can easily come to the hotel as well, and recommended some local sights such as the street food near Kota on Sundays. 

Kyriad Hotel is a great place to stay in Jakarta!
title: Impressive!

text: Had a wonderful stay here for 5 days. Kyriad Fatmawati knows well how to serve its guest. I had warm welcome from the Manager itself, Mr Ari. The room was clean, air conditioner worked well, and I had free upgrade for 2 days extension (because I wrongly chose room type for extending my stay), thanks to Miss Mery and Mr Rizky as the receptionist for the help. I also had a warm welcome when I had my breakfast, from Chef Anday (Executive Chef & Food Beverage Manager). He was so humble, that we could have some time to talk, he shared his journey and experience in being Chef. Oh, and the food he serves was really tasty. Especially his signanture 'Pindang Ikan', if you happen to stay here, don't forget to try that menu. Thankyou Kyriad Fatmawati! Would love to come back there, anytime soon!
title: Friendly Staff & Tasty Food
